content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_hidden-xs”][stm_sidebar sidebar_id=”1405″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”80px” md_spacing=”80px” sm_spacing=”80px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”80px” md_spacing=”80px” sm_spacing=”80px” xs_spacing=”80px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1452076739183{margin-top: -10px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Full time General Service Manager on site, is responsible for all catering and domestic services within the school. A wide selection of freshly made dishes is available from the Dining Hall at breakfast, lunch and dinner, with a salad bar always offered at lunch and dinner time along with hot and cold vegetarian options.

Our Managers and Chefs are trained using their own specific training course, so that they understand the company philosophy to produce a food standard that can`t be bettered; offering healthy eating with a balance between current eating trends, good nutrition and fresh home-cooked food.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″][stm_spacing sm_spacing=”40px” xs_spacing=”40px”][stm_single_image img_id=”582″ img_size=”725×503″][stm_spacing xs_spacing=”80px” sm_spacing=”80px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1455856130388{padding-top: 38px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” sep_enable=”true” title=”Menu” sep_margin_b=”32px”][/stm_title][stm_meal items_count=”2″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
